name: Shotgun Knight
description:
Shotgun Knight is an unforgiving platformer about propelling yourself upwards in search of the mysterious Double Barrel Banana. The only way to move up is by shooting a powerful shotgun with recoil that will send you up in the air but be careful as falling can set you back many hours of progress. Only those with the strongest willpower will reach the top.

Gameplay


-Master the art of the shotgun
The shotgun is deceptively simple but will take practice to master



-Up is the only way to go
With each jump, the stakes rise only to fall and lose all your progress for you to have to make that climb all over again



-The Double Barrel Banana await you
The climb may not be easy but those who push through will have a pleasant surprise awaiting you at the top



  • Climb high with nothing but yourself and a shotgun
  • Brutally difficult but addictive gameplay
  • Lose hours of progress in mere seconds
  • The Double Barrel Banana awaits those skillful enough to reach the top
